**Government Tender Announcement**

### Solicitation Details

* **Reference Number**: cb-662-67646391

* **Publication Date**: 2024-02-06
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-03-06T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: 2024-03-06

### Requirement Description

Health Canada invites proposals from qualified consultants to provide Task-Based Professional Services (TSPS) for the Development and Delivery of a Workshop on Health Risk Communications (HRC) for the Health Products and Food Branch (HPFB) Employees.

### Scope of Work

The selected contractor will be required to deliver a workshop on health risk communications, consisting of one senior resource who meets both category 3.11 and 2.15. Additional resources of the same categories may be required throughout the life of the issued contract.

### Tender Evaluation Criteria

The tender will be evaluated on the basis of the following criteria:

* Technical merit
* Price

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the provisions of the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
